title: Minimum Viable Relationships (MVR) Framework: Africa’s Prerequisite to MVP
description: Version 3 of the Minimum Viable Relationships (MVR) Framework. In high-context markets, ventures fail not because products lack utility, but because they lack relational permission. MVR provides a quantifiable, auditable readiness gate (MVR-I) that must precede MVP. This release specifies six indicators, validation architecture, and policy/AI tooling.

creators.name: Mukiibi, Farouk Mark
creators.affiliation: African Market OS / Gatsby Marketing Agency
